snippet: A day after lashing out at attacks that he called "wild and reckless," Mitt Romney rebuked President Obama for running a campaign of "enmity and jealousy and anger" during a network interview.
abstract: A day after lashing out at attacks that he called "wild and reckless," Mitt Romney rebuked President Obama for running a campaign of "enmity and jealousy and anger" during a network interview.

headline.main: Romney Delivers a Harsh Rebuke of Obama at Final Stop on Bus Tour
